full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG CAN GYI TSOGS MCHOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES YE SHES KYI MKHA' 'GRO MA SENGGE'I GDONG CAN GYI TSOGS MCHOD 'KHYER BDE BA 'DI YANG, BTZUN GZUGS YE SHES DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB KYIS LHA 'DI'I YI DAM DU BYED PA RNAMS LA NYE BAR 'KHO BA'I BSAM PAS BSKUL TE BSKANG CHOG GI YAN LAG TU BSGRIGS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
author_simple: YE SHES DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB,
